title: Analysis of the Impact of Remote Oxygen Plasma Treatment on the Surface Chemistry and Electrochemical Properties of Graphite Felt Electrodes for Redox Flow Batteries

The effects of a remote oxygen plasma (ROP) treatment on the surface of commercial graphite felts were investigated and compared against a conventional thermal treatment. In contrast to methodologies where...
